utilities

Class HashingUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.HashingUtil

  • public class HashingUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    All the SHA3 Keccak hashing algorithm calling methods.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HashingUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String generateSalt()
      Generates the next securely random 128bit long salt.
      static java.lang.String hash(java.lang.String uuid)
      Gets the hashed value of the provided UUID, using Keccak512 algorithm
      static java.lang.String hashByKeccak512(java.lang.String string)
      Gets the hashed value of the provided string, using Keccak512 algorithm
      static java.lang.String hashByKeccak512(java.lang.String string, java.lang.String salt)
      Gets the hashed value of the provided string, concatenated with the provided salt, using Keccak512 algorithm
      static java.lang.String hashBySHA512(java.lang.String string, java.lang.String salt)
      Gets the hashed value of the provided string, concatenated with the provided salt, using SHA512 algorithm
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      for testing/debugging purposes.

      • hash

        public static java.lang.String hash(java.lang.String uuid)
        Gets the hashed value of the provided UUID, using Keccak512 algorithm
        Parameters:
        uuid - the UUID about to get hashed
        Returns:
        the hashed UUID in 512bit long String format

        Returns:
        Hexadecimal String representation of a 128bit salt.

        Parameters:
